meanings.definition: A person, typically a woman, who manages a household.
meanings.sent1: Homemakers ensure the household runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Many homemakers enjoy cooking and cleaning for their families.
meanings.sent3: The homemakers in the neighborhood organized a fun potluck.
meanings.sent4: She was the homemaker of the group, always keeping everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The homemakers' dedication to their families is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: A person who takes care of the home and family, usually without being paid.
meanings.sent1: Homemakers prioritize the well-being of their loved ones.
meanings.sent2: Being a homemaker requires patience and organization.
meanings.sent3: The homemaker's secret ingredient in every meal was love.
meanings.sent4: She was the homemaker of the family, always putting others first.
meanings.sent5: The homemakers' selflessness shines through in everything they do.
